alert.note: Alert for Lemhi and Lost River Range, Challis NF (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Red Flag Warning issued July 28 at 1:44PM MDT until July 28 at 9:00PM MDT by NWS Pocatello
info.description: ...RED FLAG WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 1 PM THIS AFTERNOON TO 9 PM MDT THIS EVENING FOR GUSTY WINDS AND LOW RELATIVE HUMIDITY FOR FIRE WEATHER ZONES 410, 425, AND 476... ...RED FLAG WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 PM MDT THIS EVENING FOR GUSTY WINDS AND LOW RELATIVE HUMIDITY FOR FIRE WEATHER ZONE 476... ...RED FLAG WARNING IN EFFECT FROM NOON TO 8 PM MDT SATURDAY FOR GUSTY WINDS AND LOW RELATIVE HUMIDITY FOR FIRE WEATHER ZONE 476 BELOW 6500 FEET ELEVATION... The National Weather Service in Pocatello has issued a Red Flag Warning for gusty winds and low relative humidity, which is in effect from noon to 8 PM MDT Saturday at elevations below 6500 feet. It is also continuing the Red Flag warning for tonight until 9 PM. * AFFECTED AREA...Fire Weather Zone 476 Lemhi and Lost River Range/Challis NF. On Saturday, the affected area will be the elevations below 6500 feet. * TIMING...Until 9 PM MDT tonight, then again from noon to 8 PM MDT Saturday. * WINDS...Southwest 20 to 30 mph with gusts up to 50 mph tonight. Southwest 10 to 20 mph gusts to 30 mph Saturday. * RELATIVE HUMIDITY...As low as 12 percent. * IMPACTS...Hot, dry, and breezy conditions will support rapid wildfire spread and potentially long range spotting of embers.
info.instruction: A Red Flag Warning means that critical fire weather conditions are either occurring now, or will shortly based on these criteria for Southeastern Idaho: - Relative humidity at or below 15 percent and wind gusts of at least 25 mph in the mountains, or 30 mph in the Snake Plain.

area.areaDesc: Lemhi and Lost River Range, Challis NF
